skos:ConceptScheme.dc:title: RDA Linked Data Work
skos:ConceptScheme.dc:description: Concepts for a category of linked data work.
skos:ConceptScheme.dc:rights: Copyright Â© 2020 American Library Association, Canadian Federation of Library Associations, and CILIP: Chartered Institute of Library and Information Professionals
skos:ConceptScheme.dc:creator: RDA Steering Committee

rdf:Description.skos:definition: A category of linked data work that defines classes and properties that are used in a dataset.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A category of linked data work that defines classes and properties that are used in a dataset.

rdf:Description.skos:definition: A category of linked data work that contains concepts that are used as values for properties in a dataset.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A category of linked data work that contains concepts that are used as values for properties in a dataset.

rdf:Description.skos:definition: A category of linked data work that is an aggregation of metadata description sets that describe two or more instances of one or more entities.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A category of linked data work that is an aggregation of metadata description sets that describe two or more instances of one or more entities.
